com.github.cuter44.util.dao

类 DaoBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.cuter44.util.dao.DaoBase<T>
  • 直接已知子类:
    MsgDao, UnreadMsgDao

    public abstract class DaoBase<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    其实根本解不了耦, java的规范没有面向对象的数据库操作, 所以这个类始终要依赖Hibernate; 注意该类只能一重继承, 多于一重的继承将使getClass无法指向正确的泛型, 并使得get()方法失效 因此请将子类声明为final

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void begin()
      begin a session and transaction Both session and xact are cross-dao, aka. once you invoke CatDao.begin(), it is no needed to invoke DogDao.begin() in the same thread.
      abstract java.lang.Class classOfT() 
      void close()
      close session Since session and xact are cross-dao, DogDao.rollback() will also rollback Cats.
      void commit()
      commit transaction Since session and xact are cross-dao, It's no need to call commit() on every Dao.

      • DaoBase

    • 方法详细资料

      • begin

        public void begin()
        begin a session and transaction Both session and xact are cross-dao, aka. once you invoke CatDao.begin(), it is no needed to invoke DogDao.begin() in the same thread.

      • flush

        public void flush()
        flush cached entities to disk. Since session and xact are cross-dao, CatDao.flush() will also flush Dogs.

      • commit

        public void commit()
        commit transaction Since session and xact are cross-dao, It's no need to call commit() on every Dao.

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
        rollback transaction Since session and xact are cross-dao, DogDao.rollback() will also rollback Cats.

      • close

        public void close()
        close session Since session and xact are cross-dao, DogDao.rollback() will also rollback Cats. Uncommited xact will be automatically rolled-back on session close.

      • classOfT

        public abstract java.lang.Class classOfT()

         throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
